properties.name: Da Carmine Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Nekosystem 61, Rue des Martyrs 75009, ParisMaybe the best Pizzas in Paris! Be prepared to wait a little before having a table... Crowdy and very Italian typical style. 61, Rue des Martyrs, 75009 Paris Tel : 01 48 78 28 01

properties.name: I should have turned back
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  I had too much to drink at the before-party party. I was wearing a huge paper mache mask which obstructed my view. I was going way too fast. When I fell off my bike and was completely unhurt, I should have turned back and gone home. I don\'t remember where the party was, but we got there and had a pretty good time dancing until some drunk reveler head butted me while doing the hair shake dance to "Smells Like Teen Spirit," breaking my nose. Ugh. I shouldn\'t have taken off my mask. The giant paper mache face would have protected me.

properties.name: L'Ecurie
properties.description: Posted by Nekosystem 2, rue Laplace 75005 ParisA delicious meat-restaurant in an authentic Middle-Age atmosphear (but not "touristic one") 2, rue Laplace 75005 Paris Tel: 01 46 33 68 49

properties.name: L'Oriental
properties.description: Posted by Nekosystem 58 rue de l\'Ourcq 75019 ParisA very delicious Lebanon restaurant. Family crew. 58 rue de l\'Ourcq 75019 Paris Tel: 01 40 34 26 23

properties.name: La Madonnina
properties.description: Posted by Nekosystem 10, rue Marie et Louise, 75010 ParisA "bo-bo" Italian style good restaurant. (No Pizzas) The district (canal St Martin) is well known as "BoBo-Land", so prices may seems a little expensive, but good mood. 10, rue Marie et Louise, 75010 Paris Tel: 01 42 01 25 26

properties.name: La Pizetta
properties.description: Posted by Nekosystem 22, avenue de Trudaine 75009 ParisAnother good pizzeria, in a "bo-bo" style. They have surprising pizzas, and a nice terrasse. be sure to have a reservation! 22, avenue de Trudaine 75009 Paris Tel: 01 48 78 14 08

properties.name: Le Melocoton
properties.description: Posted by Nekosystem 10 rue Descartes 75005 ParisOld School Heavy Metal bar! Iron maiden / Saxon / Rose Tatoo... Very cool crew Happy Hour from 17:00 until 22:00 10 rue Descartes 75005 Paris

properties.name: Le Poisson Rouge
properties.description: Posted by Nekosystem 112, Quai de Jemmapes, 75010 ParisA good restaurant with fresh ingredients. They change the menu everyday. Traditionnal French cuisine with worldwide variations. Also very good good wines. It\'s located on the canal St Martin, nice view. 112, Quai de Jemmapes, 75010 Paris Tel: 01 40 40 07 11

properties.name: Maria Luisa
properties.description: Posted by Nekosystem 2, rue Marie et Louise 75010, ParisA very good pizzeria in Paris, nearby the Canal Saint Martin. A little bit "bo-bo" style, but very good pizzas. Many tables outside. 2, rue Marie et Louise 75010, Paris Tel: 01 44 84 04 01

properties.name: Rock Hair
properties.description: Posted by Nekosystem 7 bd Beaumarchais 75004 PARISMy favourite Hairdresser\'s in Paris. Ask for Niko, very talentous hair artist, he\'s a close friend to Nina Hagen! cool prices 7 bd Beaumarchais 75004 PARIS Tel: 01 42 77 01 97

properties.name: The Bombardier
properties.description: Posted by Nekosystem  2, Place du Panthéon 75005, ParisA real English Pub in Paris. Warm mood, good people, half English / half French. Happy hour until 21:00 (50cl of Guiness: 5€) Also, you can eat. 2, Place du Panthéon, 75005 Paris Tel : 01 43 54 79 22
